alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:48PM CDT until June 03 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Northeastern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 247 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Cass, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Cass... Fern... Jethro... Piney... Bidville... Barnes... Locke... Turners Bend... Paradise... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
